properties.areaDesc: Jefferson, AL; Walker, AL; Tuscaloosa, AL
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 19 at 9:11AM CST until February 20 at 7:30PM CST by NWS Birmingham AL
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Alabama...

Locust Fork At Sayre Affecting Jefferson...Tuscaloosa and Walker
Counties.
Black Warrior River At Oliver Lock and Dam Affecting Greene...
Hale...Marengo...Sumter and Tuscaloosa Counties.

.Heavy rainfall during the past 24 hours is producing rises along
the Black Warrior River...and a flood warning is now in effect for
the Locust Fork at Sayre and the Black Warrior River at Oliver Lock
and Dam.

The National Weather Service in Birmingham AL has issued a

* Flood Warning for
the Locust Fork At Sayre.
* from this afternoon to Thursday evening...or until the warning is
cancelled.
* At  8:00 AM Wednesday The stage Was 22.6 feet.
* Flood stage is 25 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by this afternoon and continue to
rise to near 26.5 feet by this evening. The river will fall below
flood stage by Thursday morning .
* Impact...At 25 feet...Flooding of low lying wood lands and
agricultural lands along the Locust Fork occurs.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas.  Turn Around...Don't Drown.

Another statement will be issued by Thursday morning...or sooner if
conditions warrant.
